ygData.subject: RE: Anyone else remember this?
ygData.msgSnippet: I m sure I remember something about a charm song that works differently or something like that. Maybe my memory is just going :) Elwyn ... From: Sylly
ygData.messageBody:
I'm sure I remember something about a charm song that "works differently" or
something like that.
Maybe my memory is just going :)


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 01, 2000 10:08 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Anyone else remember this?


From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>

At one point GZ was asked about a "mem-blur" component of one of our songs
and he mentioned that "they" had been toying with the idea of having a
'mem-blur' song for us. May this is what you were looking for?

Sylly SongSynger
Bardette of 48 songs
<The Pantheon>
somewhere on Innoruuk...
